definition: in every possible way (idiom); meticulous
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
tiny/miniature/slightly/profound/abtruse/to decline/one millionth part of/micro-/Taiwan pr. [wei2]
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
(negative prefix)/not/no
to arrive/most/to/until

sentences.english: He showed his concern for his sick mother by his many little attent ions.
sentences.chinese: 他对病中的母亲表现了无微不至的关心。

sentences.english: I'm grateful for the special love that you showed in different ways.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你深深爱我无微不至。

sentences.english: Meticulously service and the newest deluxe equipment show out the nobleness.
sentences.chinese: 无微不至管家式服务和最新的豪华设施彰显尊贵。

sentences.english: But, says Djoko, the care here is “impeccable.”
sentences.chinese: 但Djoko表示，这里的关爱却是“无微不至”的。

sentences.english: You to me in life takes good care of me.
sentences.chinese: 您在生活上对我无微不至的关怀我。

sentences.english: He cares about you so much, including the smallest things.
sentences.chinese: 他会注重生活中很多细节，对你做到无微不至的关怀。

sentences.english: She was coddled when she was ill.
sentences.chinese: 她患病时得到了无微不至的照料。

sentences.english: We have no startled day sob ghosts and gods, but meticulous care.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有惊天泣鬼神，却有无微不至的关心问候。

sentences.english: His wife is taking good, and thorough care of him.
sentences.chinese: 妻子对他照顾得无微不至，知冷知热的。

sentences.english: He likes being mothered by his landlady .
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢女房东无微不至地照顾他。

sentences.english: Love is the Woxin meticulous care.
sentences.chinese: 爱是无微不至的窝心呵护。

sentences.english: Total care, inside out, from young to old.
sentences.chinese: 从里到外，从小到老无微不至的关怀。

sentences.english: When I was sick, mother will be mothered by me.
sentences.chinese: 每当我生病时，母亲都会无微不至地照顾我。

definition: the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
to the utmost/in every possible way
considerate (of other people's needs)
to take care of/to show consideration/to attend to/to look after
docile and obedient/all obedience
to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper
totally submissive (idiom)
to love dearly
to bless/to cherish/to take good care of/to conserve
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to show concern and care for
to tend/to take care of sb
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
extremely (placed after verb or adjective)
intimate/close/considerate
